info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 10 at 9:26PM EST by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...A BAND OF HEAVY SNOW WILL AFFECT PARTS OF SOUTHERN WAYNE... WYOMING...SUSQUEHANNA...NORTHERN WAYNE...BRADFORD...LUZERNE... LACKAWANNA...AND PIKE COUNTIES... HAZARDS...A band of heavy snow which can rapidly reduce visibility to less than a quarter of a mile. LOCATION AND MOVEMENT...At 926 PM EST, a band of heavy snow was along a line extending from Rutledgedale to near Le Roy and moving southeast at 15 MPH. LOCATIONS IMPACTED INCLUDE... Scranton, Wilkes-Barre, Falls, Dunmore, Kingston, Plains, Carbondale, Old Forge, Pittston and Archbald. This includes the following highway exits... Pennsylvania Interstate 81 between 175 and 211. Interstate 84 between 1 and 46. Interstate 380 between 20 and 24. Interstate 476 between 115 and 131. SAFETY INFO... Use extra caution if you must travel into or through this band of heavy snow. Rapid changes in visibility and potentially slick roads may lead to accidents. Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations. Be prepared for snow or ice covered roads. Slow down and allow extra time to reach your destination. &&
